ygData.subject: Scheduled Maintenance (fwd)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Date: Mon, 22 Mar 1999 11:17:44 -0500 (EST) From: ONElist Tech Support  Reply-To: onelist_moderators-owner@onelist.com To:
ygData.messageBody:
---------- Forwarded message ----------
Date: Mon, 22 Mar 1999 11:17:44 -0500 (EST)
From: ONElist Tech Support <admin@onelist.com>
Reply-To: onelist_moderators-owner@onelist.com
To: onelist_moderators@onelist.com, onelist_announce@onelist.com
Subject: [onelist_moderators] Scheduled Maintenance

From: ONElist Tech Support <admin@onelist.com>

Hello,

The ONElist system will be down for scheduled maintenance this evening,
Monday March 22, 1999. We will be off-line from 8pm to 10pm Pacific Time
while we upgrade the system.

Thanks for using ONElist!


The ONElist Team

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Come check out our brand new web site!
http://www.onelist.com
Onelist: Making the Internet intimate
